title: Adverbs of Manner
explanationEnUs: Adverbs of manner describe how something is done and usually end in -ly.
explanationZhTw: 方式副詞描述某事是如何完成的，通常以 -ly 結尾。
explanationZhCn: 方式副词描述某事是如何完成的，通常以 -ly 结尾。

title: Frequency Adverbs Position
content: I [always eat|eat always] breakfast. He is [never|never is] late.
explanationEnUs: Adverbs of frequency usually come before the main verb but after the verb 'to be'.
explanationZhTw: 頻率副詞通常位於主要動詞之前，但在 'to be' 動詞之後。
explanationZhCn: 频率副词通常位于主要动词之前，但在 'to be' 动词之后。

title: Irregular Adverbs
content: He works [hard|hardly]. (meaning with effort) She drives [fast|fastly].
explanationEnUs: 'Hard' is an adverb meaning with effort ('hardly' means barely). 'Fast' is both an adjective and an adverb.
explanationZhTw: 'Hard' 是副詞，意為努力（'hardly' 意為幾乎不）。'Fast' 既是形容詞也是副詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Hard' 是副词，意为努力（'hardly' 意为几乎不）。'Fast' 既是形容词也是副词。

title: Time and Place
content: I saw him [here yesterday|yesterday here]. We are going [there now|now there].
explanationEnUs: Place adverbs (here, there) usually come before time adverbs (yesterday, now).
explanationZhTw: 地點副詞 (here, there) 通常在時間副詞 (yesterday, now) 之前。
explanationZhCn: 地点副词 (here, there) 通常在时间副词 (yesterday, now) 之前。

title: Degree Adverbs
content: It is [too|enough] hot to go out. The water is warm [enough|too].
explanationEnUs: 'Too' comes before the adjective. 'Enough' comes after the adjective.
explanationZhTw: 'Too' 位於形容詞之前。'Enough' 位於形容詞之後。
explanationZhCn: 'Too' 位于形容词之前。'Enough' 位于形容词之后。
